abilities.name: Chameleon Carapace.
abilities.description: The thri-kreen can change the color of its carapace to match the color and texture of its surroundings. As a result, it has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide.

abilities.name: Standing Leap.
abilities.description: The thri-kreen's long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting
abilities.description:
The thri-kreen's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom. The thri-kreen can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:
At will: mage hand (the hand is invisible)
2/day each: blur, magic weapon
1/day: invisibility (self only)
